pullRequest.title: Add ParentOrElse Sampler
pullRequest.bodyText:
Introduce a new kind of composite sampler - a ParentOrElseSampler - which is specified in the spec document here. A ParentOrElseSampler is initialized with a sampler delegate and makes the same sampling decision as the parent. If there is no parent, it uses the provided delegate to make a decision.
There is a separate question as to whether or not this sampler (with an AlwaysOn delegate) should be used as the default Sampler, which would fix the "bug" outlined in #1445

commit.message: Fix bug where Sampling status would not propagate from parent to child correctly

nodes.bodyText: It seems like follow parent should be a setting on any sampler, or we should support multiple samplers where any sampler can return something like NO_DECISION to allow another sampler to pick it up. Always yes seems to be unrelated to following the parent, right?
I know I am annoying, but can we do this in a followup PR? This is an important change and would like to make sure everyone aggress on, just adding the parentElse is trivial to be merged.
